response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "The person is a 22-year-old male."),

    ("arrest_history", "high", "The person has been arrested 2 times and convicted."),
    ("height", "medium", "The person is 6 feet 3 inches tall."),
    ("weight", "medium", "The person weighs 190 lbs."),
    ("marital_status", "low", "The person has never been married."),
    ("housing_status", "low", "The person is currently living alone."),
    ("education", "medium", "The person has a high school diploma and is enrolled in a 2-year college."),
    ("employment_history", "low", "The person has held only one job during the year."),
    ("drug_use", "low", "The person has not used any drugs in the past four years."),
    ("depression", "low", "The person has not felt depressed over the past month."),
    ("childhood_home_environment", "high", "The person lived with adults other than biological, foster or adoptive parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area at a young age."),
    ("religion", "low", "The person considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.")
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 90
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 22-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 2 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 3 inches and weighs 190 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is enrolled in a 2-year college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with adults other than biological, foster or adoptive parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
